mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_PFF_CHRG_LOG(PFF_CHRG_LOG_ID, TXN_TYP_ID, SPCAL_CHRG_GRP_CDE, YEAR_MTH, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, CMPNY_CDE, MRKT_GRP_ID, MRKT_ID, AC_ID, CHRG_CCY_CDE, ACRU_CHRG_AMT, ACRU_CHRWV_DR_AMT, ACRU_CHRWV_WITHOUT_POST_AMT, IS_SHOW_STMT, IS_POST_LEDG, POST_LEDG_DATE, AC_FUND_TXN_RID, REV_AC_FUND_TXN_RID, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.pffChrgLogId},#{item.txnTypId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.spcalChrgGrpCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.yearMth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.fromDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mrktGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.mrktId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.acId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.chrgCcyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.acruChrgAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.acruChrwvDrAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.acruChrwvWithoutPostAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.isShowStmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.isPostLedg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.postLedgDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.acFundTxnRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.revAcFundTxnRid,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
